meanings.sent1: The hive was queenless after the old queen died.
meanings.sent2: The ant colony became queenless when the queen was captured by a predator.
meanings.sent3: The chessboard was queenless, making it impossible to play a proper game.
meanings.sent4: The garden felt queenless without the vibrant presence of the queen bee.
meanings.sent5: The kingdom was in chaos, its queenless state leaving a void in leadership.

meanings.sent1: The queenless beehive struggled to maintain order.
meanings.sent2: The queenless termite mound was in disarray.
meanings.sent3: The queenless ant colony had to elect a new leader.
meanings.sent4: The queenless chess set was missing a crucial piece.
meanings.sent5: The queenless kingdom faced uncertainty and unrest.
